How many people are affected by polycythemia vera ?,"The prevalence of polycythemia vera varies worldwide. The condition affects an estimated 44 to 57 per 100,000 individuals in the United States. For unknown reasons, men develop polycythemia vera more frequently than women.",GHR,polycythemia vera
What are the genetic changes related to polycythemia vera ?,"Mutations in the JAK2 and TET2 genes are associated with polycythemia vera. Although it remains unclear exactly what
